subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which of the following battles is considered as the turning point of the Marwar Sultanate?
question_hi: मर्र सुल्तान सत्तानां का किस हिस्सा के बीच में जल्दी और विशाली राजनी की विपणा को बदल दी गई है।
explanation_en: The Battle of Mewar is considered the turning point of the valour and expansion of the Mewar kingdom. The Battle of Mewar marked the victory of Rana Pratap of Mewar over the Mughal Emperor Akbar in 1576 AD.

question_en: Which battle marked the beginning of the Guhil dynasty in Rajasthan?
explanation_en: The Guhil dynasty started from the Battle of Karnali. The battle took place between Raja Pratap Singh and Maharana Kumbha in 1579 AD marked the beginning of the Guhil dynasty.
question_en: Which Battle marked the beginning of the Guhil Dynasty?
explanation_en: The Battle of Karnali (सेवार गण का उबललेंर गण
explanation_en_short: The Guhil Dynasty started with the victory of Pratap Singh over Maharana Kumbha in 1579 AD.
question_en_short: In which year did the Guhil Dynasty begin?
